1.title: Another Op'nin
1.plot: ANOTHER OP'NIN introduces our three stars, highlights the league's history, and features interviews and raucous game footage that reveal the passion and camaraderie members of the Broadway community feel for each other-and for their softball.

imdb.plot outline: THURSDAY IN THE PARK is a multi-part reality series that tells the story of the 63-year-old Broadway Show League, the softball league of the Broadway community. This reality series follows three actors throughout the 2018 season in Central Park, chronicling their on-field exploits as well as their off-field lives and career moves. Exciting game footage plus extensive interviews with current and former players, stars and other characters who make up the league complete a compelling portrait of this tight-knit community that the public rarely sees off stage.
